entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Identity: Message for invalid username does not reflect actual permitted characters. #39375
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Use different calender and format info for DateTime.ToString() and DateTime.Parse() #39373
  • .NET 6 Blazor server app not Disposing razor pages on browser tab close #39370
  • Perf improvement: json_netty #39368
  • Go back to Windows.11.Amd64.ClientPre.Open #39363

Closed

  • dotnet watch: Ctrl-C doesn't reset the terminal echo on Mac #37047
    .NET 7 Planning
  • `dotnet watch run` throws AFTER CTRL-C #37113
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39010
    7.0-preview1
  • "AspNetCore.OpenIdConnect.Nonce" and "AspNetCore.Correlation" cookies unable to set cookie as Session cookies #39351
  • Perf regression: caching #39369
  • Wildcard in launchSettings.json causes "The hostname could not be parsed." #39366
  • [BindNeverAttribute] is not respected during JSON model binding (JSON over-posting vulnerability) #39337
  • Cannot start Docker container on Raspberry Pi 4 using ASP.NET Core 6 #39372
  • Component E2E test failure in Ubuntu #38613
    7.0-preview1
  • 'dotnet watch' add an arg to allow reloading in case of rude edits #37190
    7.0-preview1
  • Hot Reload: allow *always* restart for rude edits #38798
    7.0-preview1
  • AddOption/Service.Configure creating duplicated entries #38569
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Don't reuse Pipe buffer when body is read #39376
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Build ops unquarantining #39374
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for annotating required elements in collection #39367
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Use TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds for clientTimeoutInterval in ClientTime… #39325
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.2
  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39008
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] Switch to Windows.Amd64.Server2022.Open #39365
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix CertificateManagerEventSource events 16 and 30 #37625
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Allow overriding the host header if doesn't match the absolute-form host #39334
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Switch to Windows.Amd64.Server2022.Open #39364
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.2
  • Components E2E test cleanup #39349
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `be7a372` to `e2c62a7` #38755
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.32
  • Avoid declaring RazorPage<T>.Model as nullable by default #39332
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix some fast up to date check issues in VS #32140
    area-infrastructure, retrospective-action
  • Detect HTTP version on invalid HTTP/2 connection #39358
    area-runtime
  • Build ARM64 in main windows build job #38997
    area-runtime
  • Add support for DI in Hub methods #34047
    area-signalr
  • [release/5.0] Don't exclude System.IO.Pipelines from TargetingPack version check #39303
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Backport Java test fixes #39290
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.2
  • Adding EntryAssembly to AddRazorPages/AddControllers* #39085
    area-mvc
  • Linux: Fix nested group resolution for RBAC claims #35279
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Using symbolic link APIs on PhysicalFileResult to obtain the real Length and LastModifiedTime #39330
    area-mvc
  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor, .NET 7.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't exclude System.IO.Pipelines from TargetingPack version check #39302
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb92160` to `6b74da4` #39258
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Avoid logging unsupported alternative for complex type binding #39353
    area-mvc
